title: "pop-out" button on golang.org gives "server error; try again"
body:
Windows x64 10.0.10586
Chrome 50.0.2661.102

When I click "Pop-out" on https://golang.org/ I get "Server error; try again." alert box and in the console

> XMLHttpRequest cannot load https://play.golang.org/share. No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'https://golang.org' is therefore not allowed access. The response had HTTP status code 403.
